definition: to write on the sand with reeds while teaching one's son (idiom)/mother's admirable dedication to her children's education
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
Anaphalis yedoensis (pearly everlasting reed)/used in Japanese names with phonetic value Ogi

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
